areas.name: San Antonio
areas.description: Cool Right AC & Heating is proud to serve homeowners and businesses throughout San Antonio, from the historic King William District to the growing Far West Side. With summer temperatures routinely exceeding 100 degrees, reliable AC isn't a luxury here — it's a necessity. We provide fast, affordable HVAC service across all San Antonio neighborhoods.
serviceHighlights: Same-day AC repair across all San Antonio zip codes
24/7 emergency service with no overtime charges

areas.name: New Braunfels
areas.description: New Braunfels is one of the fastest-growing cities in Texas, and Cool Right is growing right alongside it. From established homes near Landa Park to new construction in Vintage Oaks and River Chase, we keep New Braunfels families comfortable through every season. Our technicians know the area and arrive prepared.
serviceHighlights: Serving New Braunfels and all of Comal County
Maintenance plans popular with Vintage Oaks homeowners

areas.name: Boerne
areas.description: Boerne's Hill Country setting means unique HVAC challenges — from cedar pollen clogging outdoor units to the temperature swings that come with higher elevation. Cool Right services Boerne and the surrounding Kendall County area with technicians who understand these local conditions and how to keep your system running efficiently.
serviceHighlights: Serving Boerne, Fair Oaks Ranch, and Kendall County

areas.name: Schertz
areas.description: Schertz sits at the crossroads of Bexar, Comal, and Guadalupe counties, and Cool Right covers all of it. With many military families stationed at nearby Randolph AFB, we understand the importance of reliable, fairly-priced HVAC service. We offer military discounts and flexible scheduling to fit your needs.
serviceHighlights: Quick response from our Broadway St location

areas.name: Helotes
areas.description: Helotes and the northwest San Antonio corridor are home to growing families who need dependable HVAC service. Cool Right provides full heating and cooling services to Helotes, including the communities around Government Canyon and the Bandera Road corridor. Our trucks are in the area daily.
serviceHighlights: Daily service routes through Helotes and NW SA
Well water and hard water HVAC solutions

areas.name: Universal City
areas.description: Universal City and the northeast San Antonio metro are home to many military families and long-time residents who count on Cool Right for honest HVAC service. Located near Randolph AFB, this community experiences the same extreme Texas heat as the rest of the metro, and we're here to keep every home comfortable.
serviceHighlights: Close proximity for fast response times
All neighborhoods in the NE metro served
